runs.comm: begins with a back of a length which is tucked away softly on the leg side
short of a length outside of off, with some movement away, as Chamu looked for the cut
shortish length outside of off which is run away through third man to get Zimbabwe off the mark
gets good carry to this shortish length going down the pads, with the batsman fending this away behind of square on the leg side
fires a short of a length which hones in on the thigh guard of Chamu, as he failed to get away the glance
pitched up, but well wide of off, as this swung away
finishes with a back of a length which curls away a touch as Chamu went fishing after it
straight away on target with this length delivery just outside of off which is given respect by the batsman
far too short outside of off as this is struck away through backward point, with Rohit putting in a fine, athletic stop to his left to intercept the ball
now flicks away this straight delivery on the pads, with this ending up at deep fine leg
strikes the pads of Chamu, with Yadav going up for the appeal, but the umpire was not interested. Looks like this may have been slipping down leg, with height another factor
outswinger which the batsman shoulders arms to
fuller length on the pads which is tucked away behind of square. However, the fielder in the vicinity fires the throw wide of the mark as the batsmen were under pressure in going for that second
able to glance away a single down the pads through fine leg
short of a length, outside of off, which is chopped away past the keeper through fine leg for a boundary
fuller delivery on and around leg which strikes the pads as the Indian make a clamour for leg before, but the umpire remains nonplussed. Probably going down leg there
short of a length outside of off which is cut away to the man at point
short of a length which beat Chamu for pace as he gets struck on top of the pads
short of a length outside of off which swings away a great deal as MS shuffled over to the right
defends this length delivery outside of off back to the bowler in his follow through
short of a length which is defended away to the leg side
fuller length outside of off which catches the outside edge of this flash from Mt Masakadza, with the ball carrying low to the keeper
full delivery on the pads which is flicked away through backward square
shoulders arms to this shortish length which shapes away outside of off stump
full delivery, just outside of off, which is edged away unintentionally to the slip, but this one carried just short
tries to work away this back of a length through mid-on, but doesn't quite get it away
is nice enough to provide a courtesy helmet check for the batsman, but it appears Chamu doesn't want any part of it

back of a length outside of off and another one bites the dust for Zimbabwe as now both openers are back in the shed after Chamu played half-heartedly at this delivery from Shami, providing a thick edge to Dhawan at slip, who took it just to the right of his position
continues to attack that fourth stump line, at a back of a length, as Taylor is enticed to have a flash
sensibly shoulders arms to this length delivery outside off stump from Shami
able to cover the line of this length delivery just outside of off
gets appreciable away movement to this length delivery outside of off
allows this one to fly through as well outside his off stump
jabs away this back of a length towards the fielder at cover
short of a length which strikes the thigh guard as he ends up being late on it
pitched up outside off as this one is driven back to Yadav
length delivery on the pads which is fended away by the batsman, but close to the body, to end the over
fuller length outside of off which is allowed to sail through to MS
gets this one to seam in upon pitching on a back of a length just outside off stump
tries to ramp this bouncer from Shami, but is unable to make a connection with the delivery as MS leapt to take this

goes hard after this short of a length outside of off, with MS and the slips clamouring for a caught behind. The umpire remains unmoved though. Snicko shows there is nothing in it though, although this may have strayed the wide margin
covers the line of this length delivery on and around off stump
full again, outside of off, as Brendan looked to blitz this through long off, but is late on the drive as the ball flashes past the edge
able to tuck away a single through midwicket
now flicks away this straight delivery on the pads, with this one ending up near long leg in the end before being reined in
full delivery, just outside of off, which is defended away on the front foot
short of a length which is nudged away to the leg side, but not to any vacant space
gets away this punch through the covers off the back foot, with the batsman running a comfortable two
fails to get away this back foot punch, with this one miscued to the bowler in his follow through
gets his radar out of whack with this wide down the leg side
just bunts away this short of a length softly on the off side
almost drags on this back of a length, before going walkabout to try and find the ball, which had actually bounced over a great deal before almost landing near his stumps after he finished his search
gets forward to this fuller length ball outside of off stump
goes up for a hopeful shout as he sends in this back of a length which hits on the top of the pads
now goes for the airy drive through the off side to this back of a length which shapes away, but is unable to make a connection
fired in, with some swing, on the pads, as Mire failed to get away this leg-side clip
pushes firmly at this fuller length which gets past the bowler and the foot of Kohli at mid-on, but is pulled back after the batsmen complete a brace
gets this one to jag in from a back of a length as Taylor played outside of the line
dismisses this length delivery outside of off, from his presence with a tonk over long off
gets into position to ramp initially to this shorter ball, before the pace outdid him in the end as he weaved away
length on the pads which the batsman fails to get away with a glance

chases after this back of a length, with the ball being struck into the ground before bouncing over the slip cordon through third man. Is just reined in, but these short boundaries had Dhawan testing his legs out to the extreme
cuts away at this back of a length which shapes away, with this one ending up in the hands of cover
another outswinger which gets good lateral movement as the batsman looked to play at it
these short boundaries are coming into play as Mire is able to get away a streaky shot to this back of a length outside off, with this flying through third man to the boundary
wide again from Mohit as Jadeja, chasing after this from cover, is able to save a run with a dive near the boundary
punches away this back of a length towards the mid-off region

length delivery outside of off which just nibbles away as Mire feathers the slightest of edges to Dhoni. MS knew right away, but Mohit had to be coerced at the last minute, but Mire ends up pulling a Gilchrist and walking before the final decision was taken
turns away this one drifted in on middle and leg through long on
gets nice and low as he defended away this Ashwin special
did not pick this one from Ashwin, with this turning over to the off side
waits on the back foot before jabbing this away through long off to get off the strike
flighted offspinner which is negotiated safely by the batsman
now nurdles away a single through long on to end the over
bowls this one round-arm onto the off stump, with this played away through the off side
now executes the sweep, fetching this one drifted on middle to get it away fine through fine leg
quicker one which turns a bit as Taylor is able to fend it away
pushes at this slightly shorter length, getting it away through the covers
chases after this one going across him, but is late on the delivery
able to nudge away a single now through midwicket to keep the strike
Raina pulls off a fantastic take at slip as this edge bounces to him off this back of a length from Mohit
looks to jab away a single through the gap at cover, but fails to do so
rocks forward to this length delivery, with this one defended away softly on the off side
meets this length delivery, with the ball ending up near the cover region. Mohit ends up taking a tumble in his follow through, and appears to be holding his ankle now. Could have rolled it here.
dropped unlucky for Mohit as straightaway he manages to get an inside-edge off Williams' bat, with MS unable to complete the catch from behind as he was a bit too late in reacting to it
content to just defend this one away on the leg side as he gets away with a life the previous ball
allows this one to spin through outside of off to the keeper
now pushes out to this one drifted in outside off, but is held by the close-in fielder on the off side
this time tries the mid-on region, but can't quite get it away
darts in one outside off which is played away towards the left of the bowler
punches away off the back foot to earn a single through long off
gets in a good stride to defend this Jadeja special from round the wicket
comes down a bit before mishitting this attempted jab back to the bowler
fuller length which is mishit again, except this time more towards midwicket
looks to steer one away past the backward point, but is unsuccessful in his attempt
fuller delivery which shapes away as it went across. Williams leans into a drive, but picks out mid-off
pitched up outside of off, with this one guided away towards mid-off
Williams not at all keen in engaging this bouncer from Mohit, with the umpire doing him a favour in calling a wide
tucks away a single now through midwicket to end the over
tossed up outside of off as this is heaved over mid-off to the long off boundary. Excellent initiative there from Williams, and fifty up for Zimbabwe
now prods forward to fend away this one drifted in on off
nurdles a single now through the long on region
shimmies down before lofting the bowler over long on, with Shami, at the position, running up and to his left, but is unable to get to it in the end
picks up a run through long on
now plays this one back to the bowler in his follow through
delivers an accurate bouncer which is negotiated well in the end by the batsman, as they steal a single
whips away this back of a length through the leg side, but straight to the close-in fielder
directs away this back of a length through the midwicket region
length delivery which is defended back to the bowler in his follow through
looks to get away the drive to the left of the bowler, but ends up hitting it a lot straighter to him
tries to pick the spot at point with a cut, but Jadeja makes a wonderful stop to his left from backward point to end that thought
driven away quite comfortably through the covers
advances down before playing this one back to the bowler in the end
now goes for the reverse sweep when he saw this dropped noticeably shorter, but is held by the man at backward point
fails to pick a single through the mid-on region
and again targets the same area, with the fielder getting behind of it
clips away a single off the back foot to deep square-leg
defends this fuller length outside of off, but is unable to find the space for a potential single
fullish length, going across him, as this is eased away square off the wicket
glides away this fuller length through third man, as the batsmen are able to complete a brace before the throw came in
able to defend away this back of a length on the leg side
looks to steer this one past the fielder at gully, but fails to do so
shortish length which is turned away softly on the leg side
cuts away this slightly short length which is drifted in, through the covers
comes down the track before guiding this to the man at long off
fends this one away drifted in outside off
now shows some innovation as he reverse sweeps perfectly through the gap at third man for a boundary
now works away a drive towards point, but is held by the fielder
able to ease away a run on the leg side now to keep the strike
and he is greeted with this reverse sweep that picks the very fine gap at third man for a boundary
now steers away this delivery floated in from outside off
nudges away a single through the midwicket region
looks to paddle this one tossed up on and around off, but is unable to get it away
defended by the batsman
now reverse sweeps powerfully away as Nottinghamshire CC will be licking their lips at the prospect of more of this over the summer!
eases away a single now through long on to bring up their fifty-run partnership
tucks away a run now through to the midwicket fielder inside of the ring
unfurls the reverse sweep, this one to a shorter one from the bowler round the wicket, as he is able to get it over the backward point fielder on the ring to the boundary
darts one in from round the wicket which is struck back to him in the end
tries to force away a jab through mid-off, but is held by the fielder
now gets away a slog just to the left of the bowler to pick up a single through long on
connects beautifully with this one tossed up from round the wicket as Williams sends this heave sailing high and mighty over the midwicket boundary. Wonderful sound as this came off the bat
now looks for the forceful drive through the covers, but is thwarted
guides away a single through long on to get off the strike
able to squeeze away a single behind of square on the leg side
nicely into position to defend away this one drifting in on off
pushes at this tossed up delivery, with the outside edge streaking away towards backward point
cuts away off the back foot, in the end getting a single to the deepish point
defends this Jadeja special with the most delicate of hands
flighted outside of off as this is struck away towards backward point
tries to nurdle a run on the leg side, but to no avail
able to get away a drive to this flatter delivery outside of off, with this ending up at long off. Brings up the Zimbabwe 100 as well
keeps the strike with this flick away through long leg
drifted in from round the wicket as Williams gets to the pitch before creaming this over midwicket for a powerful six
gives this one some flight, and bounce, outside of off as this is defended away
comes down again and sends away Ashwin with a bludgeon over cow corner. Ashwin under pressure now
gets forward to cover for any turn or extra bounce
dishes a low, full toss which Williams skips down to before striking away on the full through the vacant extra-cover region for a boundary
now looks to get away a single through fine leg, but fails to do so
comes down the track as this one tossed up hits him on the pads, but the umpire is not interested
now turned away softly on the leg side
content to defend this latest one away on the off side
struck back to the bowler, who is able to get to it, much to the amusement of the Auckland crowd
picks up a single now through sweeper cover
sliding down the pads as Williams is able to shovel over a single through backward square
sends in a short of a length which is pulled away to square-leg
able to get away a single through long on as Taylor gets to a half-century in what will be his final international outing
full delivery, outside of off, which is squirted away to backward point, with now Williams adding a single to his tally to get to fifty
Taylor dabs away a couple through third man, hustling the first run in order to come back for the second
executes the drop single outside his off stump to perfection
has a late flash at this length delivery going across him, with the keeper collecting it comfortably
on the front foot as he defends this one away to the off side
now gets away a single through the leg side

Ashwin able to reach low to take this attempted bludgeon past him from Williams. The batsman is not sure if this has carried though, with the umpires making sure by pulling up the replay. They do confirm the ball did carry enough, as India pick up a big wicket here as Williams has to go soon after reaching his fifty
beats Ervine with some turn outside his off stump
almost gets bowled to this one floated in, as it threatened to burst through the tiny gate
negotiated over to the off side to end a successful over for India
short of a length which is defended away off the back foot
looked like he may have gloved this shortish length going down the leg side, with MS and the bowler going up in tandem, but the umpire was not interested. Replays show it came off the thigh pad
glances away now through long leg to get off the strike
bumper which is duck under by Ervine as he looks to get in
shortish length which is flat-batted down towards the close-in fielder on the leg side
forces away a drive through the covers, but can only add one to his tally as a consequence
looks to jab away through the covers, but is held within the inner ring
able to get away this attempted forward defence that inadvertently affords him a single on the leg side
negotiated safely by Taylor on the back foot
now eases away a run through the long off region
defended back to the bowler in his follow through
shuffles over before guiding this to the right of the bowler to end up at long off
begins with a length delivery that is defended away on the off side
has a go at this fuller length which goes across him, but all he does is make connection with thin air
able to get away a run with a glide through sweeper cover
turns away a single now on the leg side behind of square
presents an angled face to this back of a length delivery that rushes past the inside of the bat
drives away this fullish length towards extra-cover to end the over
continues from round the wicket as this flighted delivery is bunted away on the off side
just about forces away a push through long on to get to the other end
Taylor picks his spot at cow corner to just get this wide of the man at long on to the boundary. Just heaved this one away, as this had enough to get to the rope
eases away a run through long on
works away a single now on the leg side
picks up the single in his favoured long on region to end the over
shortish length which he tried to ramp away over the keeper's head, but is late on it as he elects to weave away as a consequence
Taylor gets a sliver of fortune as he goes hard at this length delivery, with the ball flying away through third man as there were no slips in place
slower delivery, outside of off, which Taylor allows it through
short of a length, outside of off, and jabbed away towards the point region
bangs in a short ball which he tries to dispatch over midwicket, but is late on the delivery
length delivery which just nibbles away to beat the outside edge of Ervine's presented bat
tries to get away the reverse sweep to beat point, but Shikhar was all over this like white on rice
now looks to be more orthodox as he goes for the clip through mid-on, but is unable to achieve it where he would have liked
executes the sweep round the corner to perfection to find a boundary down fine leg. Takes Zimbabwe past 150
now uses his feet to slam this one drifted in high over the cow corner boundary
driven down towards long on now to get off the strike
defends this one floated in on middle and leg to end a good over for Zimbabwe
delivers a fullish length on middle and leg which is negotiated successfully by the batsman
full delivery, outside of off, which is struck away to mid-off, who ends up misfielding this to allow for the run
shortish length which is tucked away through square-leg
back of a length which is eased away behind of square for a comfortable single
content to defend away this deliver onto the leg side
glances away a brace square off the wicket to retain the strike
length delivery which is turned away through mid-on as the batsmen exchange ends
slower delivery on a leg-stump line as Ervine failed to get away the flick with some vigour
shortish length which is avoided by the batsman as he weaved out of its menacing path
slower, length delivery, going well down leg, as MS comes round to his right to collect it
on the back foot as he fended away this short of a length from the bowler
comes down the track before hammering this short of a length over the long on boundary. Just sailed away to the upper tier really
sends in a quick, full delivery on middle and leg which is dug out by Ervine
looks to guide this one past the silly mid-on, but is held in the end by the close-in fielder
puts in the sweep to this one darted in on middle and off, with this landing up at deep fine leg
steps down before lifting this cleanly over Ashwin's head to pick out the straight boundary
tries to work one away off the back foot now, but the ball slides down the leg side
comes down the track before drilling this faster one powerfully through the extra-cover region to move into the 90s
able to retain the strike with a clip behind through backward square
slices away this fuller length over extra-cover, as the right-hander had intentions to go more straight through long off
shoulders arms to this length delivery outside of off

one of the best ways you could ever bring up a hundred, especially at a tournament of this calibre. Becomes the first and only Zimbabwe batsman to score back-to-back hundreds in a World Cup. Timed away this short ball with a ramp that just flew away over to the stand at third man. Lovely way to get to a precious milestone, especially in your final international match
now gets off the strike with a glide through backward point
tries to flick away this shortish length on a leg-stump line, with this one being a wide in the end by the umpire
pulls away to Rahane at long leg, with the ball just landing before him on the bounce
when it is your day, it is your day. Lifts this fuller length from Shami clean over mid-off to bring up half-a-dozen for Zimbabwe. Also gets them to 200
shortish length which he attempts to run away through third man, but fails in the attempt

slower, length delivery going across him as Ervine paddles this over tentatively to the short backward square, who is able to collect it and fire in a throw at the striker's end. Ends up hitting it directly, but Taylor had already made his ground in time of the throw
struck away through the covers now to get off the hot seat
searches for the blockhole as he dishes up a low, full toss which is struck away to the mid-off fielder
able to get away a run down to long on
backs away before a blunder at backward point by Rohit allows this to squirt away behind to the boundary
able to nurdle away a single behind of square on the leg side
crashes away this tossed up delivery outside of off, sending this over with a slog-sweep through square-leg for four

now comes down the track to hammer this delivery drifted in on the legs, over cow corner. There was a fielder nearby at long on, but he was unable to reach it. Should mention that he is also the first Zimbabwean to score 400 in a World Cup

it's all happening here in Eden Park as Brendan bludgeons this quicker one on off over long off to become the second-highest run-scorer of the tournament. There was also a one-handed catch in the crowd from the man in orange. Have been a few spectacular efforts already in the crowd this World Cup
makes it three in a row as he paddles away this slightly dragged length, turning in from leg, through fine leg for a boundary
Brendan will not forget this farewell from the international stage anytime soon. Just creams Ravindra high over the long on boundary to end the over in magnificent style
Ervine content to defend away this length delivery onto the off side

gets away this flick off the pads towards backward square, who once again throws down the stumps at the striker's end when he sees who it is that is coming through. Replays confirm that Taylor was definitely in though. Ervine wouldn't want to pull a Samuels here now
backs away to try and make room on the off side, but is followed by the bowler as he ends up inside-edging onto the pads, with the ball spilling over to the cover region to afford him a single
full delivery on leg stump which is driven down to mid-on, who ends up misfielding to allow for the single

and the Taylor special has to come to a close as he looked to force away this back of a length over the mid-on region, but ends up losing a glove off the handle as he went for the loft, with this one spooning comfortably to the fielder. Congratulations from the Indian players as he makes his way off the ground. One of the all-time great performances by a batsman playing his last international innings. Has he done enough to give Zimbabwe a threatening total in Auckland though?
Ervine decides to become the aggressor now as he pulls this shortish length quite competently through midwicket to end the over
turns away a single now on the leg side, but fails to pick the gap
gets away a single now through short fine leg
turns away the bowler with a clip through midwicket
struck back to the bowler in his follow through
darts one in full as Raza looked to skip down to try and force away a stroke. Ends up digging it out quite successfully
just defends this one away to end the over

excellent slower delivery from Mohit that makes Ervine looks slightly amateur as he dances down before getting a top-edge to this disguised ball from the bowler, with the ball flying high over to Mohit, who barely had to move from his position when it went up initially. Ends a solid contribution from the left-hander, but Zimbabwe will need plenty more as we get into the latter stages
bangs in a shorter one which is ramped away over to the point region, but away from any fielders
Raza just pummels this short of a length outside his off stump as he almost looked to be waiting on the back foot before rocking forward to power this over the long on boundary
waits on this slower, back of a length, as he attempted to squirt this one away through the gap at third man, but is reined in by the boundary rider
dishes up a full toss as he looked for the blockhole, with this one whipped away instinctively with the angle through fine leg

flicks away this shortish length, slanting down the leg side, as there was a leg-side trap in place at deep fine leg, but the plan did not quite come off as expected as this one bounced to him in the deep
Regis looking to manipulate this one on leg stump through fine leg, and ends up swinging himself off his feet as a result

backs away to try and hammer the bowler over long off, but ends up giving away a streaky edge to short third man, who ends up firing a throw at the striker's end. MS saw this one about to hit the stumps, so let it go through, but even despite that, the batsman was able to make his ground
chips away the bowler now through the long on region
short and wide and scythed away through the off side to deep extra-cover
backs away again, but Jadeja followed him as he fired one on leg stump, which is played back to him in the end
bit of width on offer as Regis rocked back to cut, with Dhawan able to just cut this off before the square boundary on the off side
short and on the off stump as this one is pulled to deep backward square leg
delivers a helmet check for the batsman, with Raza doing well to bend his back to avoid this
short again and this time Raza is able to get him with a pull through backward square that rockets away to the rope
backs away and then leans into this lofted carve over extra-cover, with this one timed beautifully to sail over the short boundary with ease
short again and this gamble from Zimbabwe is paying off dividends as Raza just slams this over the midwicket boundary to make it consecutive sixes

goes round the wicket and delivers the y-word which seemed to have been missing all this time. This one finds its mark right at the base of middle. Ends a lovely little cameo from Raza as Zimbabwe look to pile on the runs
begins with a full delivery down the pads as he gets his radar slightly off track
digs out this fuller delivery on leg stump to the deep fine leg fielder
on the pads, and full, as this is flicked away through the vacant space at long leg. Poor bowling there by Yadav as he didn't bowl to his field
better from Yadav now as this length delivery outside of off is defended by the batsman
able to blitz away this lofted, inside-out drive over long off, with the pair picking up a brace as a result
better line and length, outside of off, as Tinashe is unable to get his bat on it
has a go at this back of a length outside of off, but is late on the delivery

if Regis connected with this, I am not sure how I would have reacted. Attempts an ABdeVilliersesque reverse paddle-sweep as he stood in position for this back of a length, as he tried to get this one away over the ring at third man
executes another fine yorker as Chakabva swings hard, but the ball goes off the boot to short fine leg
Shami delivers again towards the death for India as Tinashe tries in vain to bludgeon this fuller one high over the cow corner boundary, but ends up holing to deep midwicket
tries to hammer this short ball out of Eden Park, but fails to make a connection
tries for the blockhole as he offers a full toss which is struck away to the midwicket fielder
looks to push at this fuller length going across him, but is late on the delivery

Yadav able to remove the dangerous Regis as he delivers a 142 kph bouncer which the batsman fails to latch onto as he looked to go over fine leg, but ends up holding out to Rohit in the deep at backward square. India just one away now from making it a perfect 60 out of 60 wickets for the tournament
guides this back of a length down to third man for one
almost gets his middle and leg stump knocked back to this slightly back of a length which nibbles in as it passed over the stumps
covers the line of this length delivery on and around off stump
and India do make it a perfect 60 for 60 as Yadav rattles the stumps with this full, straight delivery that Chatara plays all around of
